```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```



```{r}


#Attach packages
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
#library(rmarkdown)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
#library(tinytex)
#library(xtable)

```


```{r}
#Load data

supp <- read_csv("C:/Users/v.r.saccomanno/Desktop/Fed_Fish_Disasters/Supp_econ_table_csv_R_FINAL.csv")
#View(supp)


```

```{r}


kable(supp, "latex", booktabs = T, longtable = T, align =rep("l", 8),
      caption = "Summary of revenue impact by all approved Federal Fisheries Disasters")%>%
  kable_styling(latex_options = c("striped", "scale_down", "repeat_header")) %>%
  landscape(margin = NULL)%>%
  column_spec(1, width = "6em")%>%
  column_spec(2, width = "6em")%>%
  column_spec(3, width = "6em")%>%
  column_spec(4, width = "8em")%>%
  column_spec(5, width = "6em")%>%
  column_spec(6, width = "8em")%>%
  column_spec(7, width = "6em")%>%
  column_spec(8, width = "15em")%>%
  row_spec(0, bold= T)

```
